participant_1.background:
My favorite color is orange.
I hate wearing make up.
I own a hot pink moped.
I have really long fingernails.

participant_2.background:
I work in sales.
I always answer my cellphone.
It s important to me to make my clients happy.
I take fridays off in the summer.
When things go wrong , i do everything i can to make it right.

content.text: Hi there! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, go out on adventures, and learn new things.
That sounds great! I like to do similar things. I love to go on walks, read books, and listen to music.
Oh, I love to read books too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love all sorts of books, but I especially like historical fiction and romance novels.
I love historical fiction too! I'm currently reading a book about the Civil War.
Oh, I've read a few books about the Civil War. They're really interesting!
I know, right? I love learning about all the different aspects of the war.
Me too! I'm also a big fan of romance novels. I love a good love story.
Me too! I think romance novels are so romantic and heartwarming.
What are some of your favorite romance novels?
I love all the books by Danielle Steel. She's my favorite author.
I've read a few of her books too. They're really good!
I know, right? I love her writing style.
I do too! She's so good at telling a story.
I know, right? She's an amazing author.
I'm glad you like her too!
Me too! She's my favorite author.
